title: Add user-uploaded KR Staffing logo as site brand logo (and favicon)

requirements.text: Replace the site’s brand logo static asset with the user-uploaded KR Staffing logo artwork, keeping the existing static asset path `/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png` so the Header and Footer continue to display the updated logo without code changes.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png`.
The Header logo (`frontend/src/components/layout/Header.tsx` img src `/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png`) renders the new uploaded logo on all screen sizes.
The Footer logo (`frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.tsx` img src `/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png`) renders the new uploaded logo.
No routes, navigation links, or other UI behavior changes occur as part of this update.

requirements.text: Generate and set a matching favicon derived from the uploaded logo artwork, keeping the existing favicon path `/assets/generated/brand-favicon.dim_64x64.png` referenced by `frontend/index.html`.
acceptanceCriteria: A new image file exists at `frontend/public/assets/generated/brand-favicon.dim_64x64.png`.
`frontend/index.html` continues to reference `/assets/generated/brand-favicon.dim_64x64.png` and the browser tab favicon updates to the new icon after refresh.
The favicon is visually legible at small sizes (16–32px) and not cropped awkwardly.

constraints: Keep the existing static asset paths used by the UI: `/assets/generated/brand-logo.dim_512x128.png` and `/assets/generated/brand-favicon.dim_64x64.png`.
Serve logo and favicon as static frontend assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (no backend image routing).
Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other `frontend.immutablePaths` listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text (no copy changes are required for this request).
nonGoals: Do not change the site color theme, layout, routes, or any job portal functionality.
Do not add new navigation items or modify the admin/auth flows.

required: Uploaded KR Staffing Enterprises logo converted to a wide logo image (brand-logo.dim_512x128.png)
Uploaded KR Staffing Enterprises logo converted to a favicon icon (brand-favicon.dim_64x64.png)
